Parameters: Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "dst" by the mode This value must never be null.
Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "src" by the mode This value must never be null.
BlendMode: The blend mode that combines the colors from the two shaders. This value must never be null.
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.Description: Create a new compose shader, given shaders A, B, and a combining PorterDuff mode. When the mode is applied, it will be given the result from shader A as its "dst", and the result from shader B as its "src".
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.FullName: public ComposeShader (Shader shaderA, Shader shaderB, BlendMode blendMode)

Parameters: Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "dst" by the mode This value must never be null.
Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "src" by the mode This value must never be null.
Xfermode: The mode that combines the colors from the two shaders. If mode is null, then SRC_OVER is assumed. This value must never be null.
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.Description: Create a new compose shader, given shaders A, B, and a combining mode. When the mode is applied, it will be given the result from shader A as its "dst", and the result from shader B as its "src".
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.FullName: public ComposeShader (Shader shaderA, Shader shaderB, Xfermode mode)

Parameters: Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "dst" by the mode This value must never be null.
Shader: The colors from this shader are seen as the "src" by the mode This value must never be null.
PorterDuff.Mode: The PorterDuff mode that combines the colors from the two shaders. This value must never be null.
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.Description: Create a new compose shader, given shaders A, B, and a combining PorterDuff mode. When the mode is applied, it will be given the result from shader A as its "dst", and the result from shader B as its "src".
ComposeShader(android.graphics.Shader,an.FullName: public ComposeShader (Shader shaderA, Shader shaderB, PorterDuff.Mode mode)

ClassDesc: A subclass of shader that returns the composition of two other shaders, combined by an @B_android#graphics#Xfermode_E@ subclass.
